overview: Drop everything right now and come along for a joyride with our college school girls! Let them show you how much fun it is to be naughty. Take Carly Parker for example, picking circus-cocked Ben English for her first boy-girl scene or how about norwegian statuesque goddess Saana caught worshipping at the altar of the humongous penis. Cover-girl Denise K. swallows man-seed to the last drop, while hot mamacita Destiny Summers squeals like a Tijuana whore under Mr. Pete's heavy banging. Last but not least, sweet-ass slut Kinzie Jo faces off gargantuan uber pervert Chris Charming in a battle that only has one winner: You!
title: Naughty College School Girls 37
